item.title: Test post 2
item.description: knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE) R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. When you click the Knit button a document will be generated that includes both content as well as the output of any embedded R code chunks within the document.

item.title: Hello R Markdown

item.title: Sentiment Analysis of Tweets to Irish Banks
item.description: Twitter Sentiment Analysis Analysing sentiment based on a text string is pretty classic introductory problem in the field of Machine Learning. The idea is seductively simple - by analysing the data of publically available tweets is it possible to discern or extrapolate some additional analysis.

item.title: About
item.description: “The pure and simple truth is rarely pure and never simple” This is a “hello world” example website for the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.
